name: Jack Widow
description: As the name suggests, this sativa-dominant hybrid is a cross between two infamous, award-winning strains: White Widow and Jack Herer. The plant lives up to its lineage, with high THC content and stable, long-lasting sativa effects. Its growing difficulty is easy to moderate. As a plant, Jack Widow is compact, resistant, and high yielding. Flowering times are quick, between 6 and 7 weeks.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Euphoric, Creative, Hungry, Stress, Pain, Nausea, Depression, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid
